title: Bell's theorem allows local theories of quantum mechanics. (arXiv:2211.01331v2 [quant-ph] UPDATED)
description: A recent Nature Physics editorial (Nat. Phys. (2022) 18, 961) falsely claims ``any theory that uses hidden variables still requires non-local physics.'' We correct this claim and explain why it is important to get this right.
dc:creator: Jonte R. Hance, Sabine Hossenfelder
